creator: rotman@microweb.nl
text:
If i use this svg file:

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<svg width="250.0px" height="250.0px">
    <text x="31.0px" font-size="15.0px" y="24.0px"
        text-decoration="underline" text-anchor="start"
        fill="rgb(0,0,0)" font-family="Lucida Sans Typewriter">
        This is a text
        <tspan x="31.0px" dy="1em">that covers multiple</tspan>
        <tspan x="31.0px" dy="1em">lines</tspan>
    </text>
</svg>

The underline is placed incorrect. For the text within the <tspan> elements 
the underline is placed under the previous textline. This is also the case 
when the underline is set within a style attribute 
(style="text-decoration:underline").

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: *** Bug 10133 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This and many other cases should be fixed in my next commit 
(expect later today 7/8/2003).
creator: deweese@apache.org
